p: We next present two visual outputs from MVSE, comparing some of the seasonal differences in the estimated index P between Recife and São Paulo (for a more complete set of possible outputs see S1_Text). Figure 2 shows the timing of highest index P and sensitivity of P to each of the climatic variables. For visual convenience, we restrict MVSE's output to the period of 4 years, between 2010 and 2013.
